instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message: There are no signs of spillage on the board I ran diagnostics and its failing for thunderbolt issues. There is no external output. Where to start troubleshooting this issue?

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message:
Check if TBT_A_HV_EN goes high when insert a thunderbolt device.
Be sure to have 3V at pin 20/J3200.
Also check if TBT_A_HPD reacts when plug in Thunderbolt.

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message:
TBT_A_HV_EN  does not change
pin 20/J3200 = 3v
TBT_A_HPD goes to 0.5v  when I plug in Thunderbolt

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message:
Thunderbolt detection not working properly.
Did you try another device?

Do you get PP3V3_S4_TBTAPWR

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message:
What should you get at TBT_A_HPD ? is that for detection?
PP3V3_S4_TBTAPWR  is 3v

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message: HPD= HotPlugDetect; it should go above 2V.

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message: Adapter is working as I have tested it on another board.  U2800 faulty?

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message:
Check HPD level on the other board.
Compare voltage reaction on different signals.
Also search for differencies of diode mode readings between both boards.

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message: It not the same model board

threads.title: 820-3437b no thunderbolt
threads.message:
Thunderbolt port should have the same pins.
Check the reaction voltage and diode mode at HPD pin...
